LanguageData.StrangerInBlackJoin.label: Grignr wanders by
LanguageData.StrangerInBlackJoin.letterText:
A mysterious man who happened to be wandering by, clad in a bearskin hat with beer in hand, has noticed your plight.

Sensing adventure he comes rushing to your aid!

He appears to not be from around these parts, there is something distinctly otherworldly about him. Maybe he will be the saviour this colony needs, only time will tell.
